A seer stone used by the Prophet Joseph Smith(Wikimedia Commons fair use) 

I’m glad that we’re now being completely forthright on this and other issues. We have nothing to hide. The Gospel is true. 

http://scripturalmormonism.blogspot.com/2017/02/joseph-smiths-use-of-seer-stone-in.html 

Thanks to Robert Boylan for alerting me to this. I’m not a regular reader of The Friend .
